document_data.name: Ormynd
document_data.mainbody: '''Ormynd''' was a noble family from the land of the [[Red Wizards of Thay]] before the 11{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The House Ormynd was the first owner of the [[enchanted]] weapons later known as the ''[[battle axe of Mauletar]]''. In the {{YearlinkName|1074}}, people of Thay rose against oppressive [[Zulkir]]ate regime. This became a short but bloody civil war. Members of the House Ormynd were fleeing the country when they were betrayed by close allies. The family friend and bodyguard, named [[Mauletar]] sacrificed his life, allowing the family to escape.
